name: Dutch-Style Beef and Cabbage
author: Brenda Schlosser Morrison

ingredients.name: to 1 1/2 lb. beef round steak, cut 3/4 inch thick

instructions: Trim excess fat from meat, cut into cubes. Combine flour, salt and pepper; coat meat with flour mixture. In skillet, quickly brown meat on all sides in hot oil. Drain off fat. Transfer meat to crockery cooker; add onions. In same skillet, combine water, vinegar and bouil- lon granules. Stir together scraping browned bits from skillet; pour over meat in cooker. Cover and cook on low-heat setting for 8 hours. About 15 minutes before serving, cut cabbage wedges into 4 or 5 serving wedges. Cook in 3 quart saucepan in a large amount of boiling salt- ed water until tender, 10 to 12 minutes. Drain well. Serve beef mix- ture over hot cooked cabbage wedges.
